title: How would you build Talon this season?
body:
So before you spaz out at me or something for asking how to build Talon when I obviously main him, I already know how to build him and I do pretty well each game with him. but I was just wondering how other people might build this preseason, thanx :D
And also if anyone wants to duo with me hmu, I should be on quit a bit :D

replies.body: I mean i don't think it's really changed, build lethality out the ass, and then pick between sustain, defense and % pen for your remaining 2 items (based on the enemy comp).
